TopicTitle: The Name Change Thread (WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!)

Articles.Content:
Hmmm, what about Aerodynamic Kerbal or Ju-87 Stuka?

**Edited <time datetime="2021-07-24T06:13:38Z" title="07/24/2021 06:13  AM" data-short="2 yr">July 24, 2021</time> by Som-Boi\_lol**

> 
> 
> 37 minutes ago, Som-Boi\_lol said:
> 
> 
> Hmmm, what about Aerodynamic Kerbal or Ju-87 Stuka?
> 

Done.
Thanks!

Why change username once per person?

Can my username be changed to Terminal Velocity

> 
> 
> 51 minutes ago, Rocketry101 said:
> 
> 
> Why change username once per person?
> 

I think the mods said that there'd be too many requests otherwise. Don't quote me on that though.
Oh

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, Rocketry101 said:
> 
> 
> Why change username once per person?
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Can my username be changed to Terminal Velocity
> 

Your name has been changed, and yes, the limit is so we don't get overwhelmed with requests, and so that people can't start trouble and then try to escape the consequences with name changes.

> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, Vanamonde said:
> 
> 
> Your name has been changed, and yes, the limit is so we don't get overwhelmed with requests, and so that people can't start trouble and then try to escape the consequences with name changes.
> 

That’s makes sense why one time only. Anyways thanks for the name change

> 
> 
> On 5/10/2017 at 10:15 PM, Red Iron Crown said:
> 
> 
> One name change is enough, and one more than we'd allow if it were solely up to me. Consistency of name is an important part of an online community, otherwise you have no idea who you're talking to. Unlimited, user initiated name changes would be a very bad thing.
>
Could my name be changed to MattExomoon? I've changed my name to MattExomoon on most of the platforms I'm on.

> 
> 
> 5 hours ago, Mattdiction said:
> 
> 
> Could my name be changed to MattExomoon? I've changed my name to MattExomoon on most of the platforms I'm on.
> 

Okay.
Could My name be changed to just be KspNerd?

> 

[@KSPNerd](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/156193-kspnerd/) might object to that
the heck, I guess no change then

**Edited <time datetime="2021-09-01T07:26:47Z" title="09/01/2021 07:26  AM" data-short="2 yr">September 1, 2021</time> by Josh K.**

> 
> 
> 18 hours ago, Josh K. said:
> 
> 
> Could my name be changed to Kelly Roadkill, please? Thanks a lot.
> 

It seems so.

I think one name change only is kinda stupid. Because, if, say, one misspells the name they want, then they would be stuck with a name they do not want. Same with the moderator screwing it up. (No offense!)
